item.title: Grounding Yoga Poses
item.description: A 26-minute yoga class focusing on challenging yoga poses that help us to be more grounded.

item.title: Feel Good Yoga Flow
item.description: A 16-minute yoga flow class led by Molly.

item.title: Being Joyful Yoga Flow
item.description: A 19-minute yoga flow class with a garden theme.

item.title: Kids Yoga
item.description: Yoga Garden offers weekly 45-minute yoga and mindfulness classes to kids 6-8 years old.

item.title: Family Yoga
item.description: Yoga Garden offers quarterly hour-long family yoga classes. These classes are designed for two people and include many partner yoga poses and games.

item.title: Prickle Jar
item.description: This 6-minute mindfulness activity explains how to make a ‘Prickle Jar” to contain worries.

item.title: Sun Salutation Flow
item.description: A 10-minute yoga flow class focusing on the Sun Salutation flow for the morning to create energy in the body and mind.

item.title: Sun Thoughts Jar
item.description: This 5-minute mindfulness activity explains how to make a “Sun Thoughts Jar” to hold positive affirmations.

item.title: Tween Yoga
item.description: Yoga Garden offers weekly hour-long yoga and mindfulness classes to kids 9-12 yrs old.
